meanings.definition: A person or thing that quips.
meanings.sent1: The class clown is known as the quipper for his witty remarks.
meanings.sent2: The quipper in the group always has a clever comeback ready.
meanings.sent3: The quipper at the party had everyone laughing with their quick jokes.
meanings.sent4: Her sharp tongue turned her into the quipper of the office.
meanings.sent5: The quipper's humor brightened up the dull meeting.

meanings.definition: To make a quip or quips.
meanings.sent1: She loves to quip during conversations to keep things light-hearted.
meanings.sent2: He would often quip about the weather to break the ice.
meanings.sent3: The comedian continued to quip even when the audience was silent.
meanings.sent4: His ability to quip effortlessly made him the life of the party.
meanings.sent5: The friends would quip back and forth, creating a fun atmosphere.
